page.title: 16BUS SERVICES
page.content: The bus service count for several of the squares in our block is three or four, a good example of how misleading bald statistics can be, since some of the buses only run one day a week. The{LINCOLNSHIRE ROAD CAR}runs from Grantham through{Little Bytham}and {Careby}to Stamford twice a day, Monday to Friday. It now returns by different routes in the morning and afternoon, thus qualifying as two services. { Holywell}has one{BLAND'S}bus from Oakham to Stamford (and back) on a Wednesday, two on a Friday and two on a Saturday. The Saturday service also visits{Careby}and{Little Bytham. A{DELAINE}bus runs from Bourne to Stamford market (and back) via{Little {Bytham}and{Careby}on a Friday. There are school and works buses. The children from{Careby}travel to{Little {Bytham}Primary School by taxi.
